document.full_text: american actor farley granger, best known as a 1950s screen idol for his starring roles in alfred hitchcock's thrillers "rope" and "strangers on a train," has died. he was 85.
document.title: actor farley granger dies, age 85
lines_and_colors: american actor farley granger, best known as a 1950s screen idol for his starring roles in alfred hitchcock's thrillers "rope" and "strangers on a train," has died. he was 85.
